reviewText: A great comedy that had me laughing nearly all the way. Certainly a wonderful twist to the normal comedy movies and many can learn from it.
works good
As can be seen by the solo star - did not appreciate this one.

This was another movie I had seen a trailer for while watching another DVD that I had ordered / purchased.  It was another wise choice to purchase this movie / DVD.  It is really funny, & a movie that the entire family can also enjoy watching together.

The Seller does know how to ship and are on the ball about sending it out in a decent time. As for the Movie it is for 9 - 12 year old. If you like Goose Bumps TV show, then you would have a good chance of like this movie.
The real emotion that makes a character memorable just was not there thus I was disappointed. The youth, ages 7 and 9  laughed at the simple plot but did not state that would watch it again.
The Great Ghost Rescue had a weak plot. But was ok. I still enjoyed with my wife as well as my son and daughter and her husband.
This movie is not scary, if anything it is kind of funny. I found myself cheering for the ghosts. This is just a funny, cute movie to watch. I watched it with my 6 year old son and he loved it.
We rented this movie first for our 9 year old son and he loved it. I am now going to buy it so I can return the rental.

The titles says it all. This movie is one of the worst that I have ever seen. I am 11 years old and don't get scared of Goosebumps but not ready for horror movies and I love scary things so we bought this. Not scary at all! Amazon really needs a zero star rating. I've heard other customers say that too, so Amazon, please make one!
Great movie, now my 5 year old old's are not afraid of ghost!

Originally saw this on Netflix or perhaps Amazon Prime. My 10 year old made us watch it twice last year on the projector outside. Sorry not sorry for annoying the nuts off my turd neighbors. Anywho, he wanted to share the joy with his friends on a sleepover and was wrecked to learn he couldn't stream it. Thank god I found a disc. The kids all loved this and honestly, I do too. Kevin McKidd kills it as Hamish

I have looked for this film for years, having rented it at Blockbuster many years ago and since wondering if I would ever find it again. Of course I hadn't remembered the title until recently so there you go This is a funny, eclectic, strange whimsical movie. Cheesy CGI not withstanding I found the characters delightfully amusing and this is going to be in my all time  top 10 ghost movies.
a fun flick
Funny
A very cute ghost story. Good special effects and a charming cast. Family friendly.
got here early, and play just fine
Cute, clean family movie.  Lots of twists and turns.
Good fun movie to watch with your kids. I enjoyed this.
Slow plot, cheesy effects, and limping story line make this an "avoid and don't buy" item.  I thought it looked interesting, but it almost looks like a high school theater project.
